title: File Heavy Vehicle Use Tax (Form 2290)
description: A trucking company needs to file Form 2290 and pay the annual Heavy Vehicle Use Tax for its fleet.

tasks.description: Gather the list of all taxable vehicles in the fleet, including their Vehicle Identification Numbers (VINs).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete list of vehicles.

tasks.description: Calculate the total tax due based on the number and weight of the vehicles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the total tax liability.
Agent successfully files the return and receives a stamped Schedule 1 as proof of payment.
